name: Disney Fireworks
description: Light Up the Night with Disney Fireworks! Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls…touch and flick to trigger a dazzling nighttime extravaganza of color and fun with Disney Fireworks! Aim rockets to their matching colors in the sky to ignite an explosion and score points. Time them perfectly to improve your Wow Meter and unlock special surprises and rockets! Disney Fireworks comes with five themed environments, original music, 15 challenging levels for each world, high score tracking, and much more!
